appliedOnHostingPlatform(string,string).details: marks a poll as applied on the hosting platform

constructor.details: Create a new ballot to choose one of 'proposalNames'.

submitNewPoll(string,string,string,strin.details: Submit a new pull request into the voting database

params._description: description of the poll / text of the pull request
params._hostingplatform: the name of the hosting platform, where the pull request is happening
params._pullRequestId: technical id of the pull request on the hosting platform
params._pullRequestLink: link to the pull request on the hosting provider web ui
params._title: title of the poll / title of the pull request
params._voteEnd: timepoint of the vote to end

params.key: the pull request to vote for
